page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar item edit object

property.name: type
property.description: The type of item. For an edit item the value must be "edit".

property.name: update
property.description: When to update the bound value. The default value is "default", which updates the bound value on every key press. A value of "done" will only update the bound value when the user hit the ENTER key, or leaves the control.

property.name: theme
property.description: The theme to use for the edit.

property.name: style
property.description: The inline CSS to put on the edit.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the edit.

property.name: watermark
property.description: The settings for the edit watermark.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the edit when showing the watermark.

property.name: text
property.description: The text to display in the edit when there is no value.

property.name: value
property.description: The path to the property in the data that the value for the edit is stored.

property.name: show
property.description: The show expression for the item.
